name: English for Beginners
shortDesc: Learn basic English skills for daily communication.
longDesc: This course helps beginners master greetings, daily conversations, and pronunciation in real-life contexts.

name: English Grammar Essentials
shortDesc: Master essential grammar rules for correct English usage.
longDesc: Youâ€™ll learn tenses, sentence structures, prepositions, articles, and how to use grammar accurately in both writing and speaking.

name: Business English Communication
shortDesc: Enhance your English communication in a business setting.
longDesc: Practice emails, meetings, negotiations, and formal presentations in English with real business scenarios.

name: IELTS Preparation Course
shortDesc: Get ready for your IELTS test with expert strategies.
longDesc: Covers all four IELTS skills: Listening, Speaking, Reading, and Writing. Includes mock tests and score feedback.

name: English Listening & Speaking Practice
shortDesc: Improve your fluency and pronunciation in real situations.
longDesc: Daily practice with conversations, pronunciation drills, and role-play activities to boost confidence and fluency.

name: TOEIC Test Preparation
shortDesc: Prepare for the TOEIC exam with practice tests and tips.
longDesc: Includes vocabulary building, grammar review, and timed practice tests modeled on the official TOEIC format.

name: Advanced English Writing
shortDesc: Write essays, reports, and emails with precision.
longDesc: Learn to write clearly and professionally, using academic and workplace formats. Peer review and tutor feedback included.

name: English for Travel & Tourism
shortDesc: Essential English for travelers and tourism professionals.
longDesc: Covers airport, hotel, restaurant, shopping, and sightseeing vocabulary and dialogues for global travelers.
